/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
